ygData.subject: RE: Dragoon Dirk
ygData.msgSnippet: I finally picked up a Pugius Dagger which is Damage 5, 21 delay, hits magic creatures, to use with my Dragoon dirk in my off-hand.  Not a bad weapon at all,
ygData.messageBody:
I finally picked up a Pugius Dagger which is Damage 5, 21 delay, hits magic
creatures, to use with my Dragoon dirk in my off-hand. Not a bad weapon at
all, the speed rating is incredible, and if you compare the speed and damage
of the combine LS to the Pugius, I think it is a pretty close toss-up as to
which is better. Plus for the bard I think the 2-dagger look and the quick
dual-wield "pierce-pierce-pierce-pierce" is awesome. Next I need get myself
an obsidian shard...

Faras Tar'Linedhel



> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jones, Brian [mailto:brian.jones@...]
> Sent: Monday, July 26, 1999 3:43 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Dragoon Dirk
>
>
> From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>
>
> Off topic just for your benefit. Actually it is not that
> much off topic
> since the bad is a rogue-type class and notorious for using dagger and
> piercing weapons (thats why bards have some thieving abilites).
>
> Combine Longsword: Damage 6, 28 delay, hits magical creatures
> Dragoon Dirk: Damage 6, 23 delay, +2 dexterity, +3 magic.
>
> Hands down Dirk is way better.
>
>
> > ----------
> > From: Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)[SMTP:kblair@...]
> > Reply To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Sent: Monday, July 26, 1999 2:59 PM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: RE: [eqbards] Dragoon Dirk
> >
> > From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
> >
> > > Yes, but this particular dagger is better than a
> > > combine longsword. Same damage, better speed, and
> > > buffs as well. probably less weight, too.
> > >
> > > Quite a bargain
> >
> > I bought my combine for 30pp.. Someone wants 75pp for the
> dagger.. I'm
> > sorry
> > I can't recall the exact specs on the Dirk at the moment,
> but I don't
> > believe they're worth 45pp (or even 20+pp if you had bought
> the CLS from a
> > gypsy for 50pp). But then again, that's just my opinion. I
> don't want to
> > start an off topic thread on weapons and such. =)
